Summarize data within effort segment

Source: R/airdas_effort_segdata.R
airdas_effort_segdata.Rd

Summarize data for continuous effort section by effort segment

airdas_effort_segdata(das.df, subseg.lengths, eff.id)

Arguments

das.df

data frame; todo
subseg.lengths

todo
eff.id

numeric; todo

Value

Data frame...

Details

Get summary data for effort segment

Examples

y <- system.file("airdas_sample.das", package = "swfscAirDAS")
y.proc <- airdas_process(y)

y.chop <- airdas_effort_chop(y.proc[1:33, ], 1)
airdas_effort_segdata(y.chop[[1]], y.chop[[2]], 1)
